reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit for Logitech C270 camera
reviews.reviewText: My new employer sent me a new 1080P camera, but I didn't like the fact that the new camera has such a wide viewing angle. So, I continued to use my old Logitech C270 which is 720P (plenty for Zoom meetings) and has a narrower viewing angle.The new 1080P camera had a built-in cover, but my old Logitech C270 does not have a cover.I bought this cover and it fits perfectly on my old Logitech C270 camera. It snaps on and stays in place.I like the fact that I can see the LED indicator when the cover "door" is open or closed.Other reviewers have complained about the price of this item. It appears to have been 3D-printed, so I understand that the creator spent a lot of time developing a 3D print image, and plenty of wear and tear on his/her 3D printer. I think this thing is worth the price.The sliding "door" was a little tight. I trimmed it with an X-Acto knife. Now, it works almost perfectly. It's a little tight when I slide it all the way to the left, but I think a little silicone lubricant will fix that.Overall, it's perfect for my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It Does The Job!
reviews.reviewText: This cover is a ** PERFECT FIT ** for my Logitech C270 webcam! it easily snapped on the camera's face and it ain't coming off "on its' own".My only nit is the slide cover is a little "loose", but if I position it to "almost removed" it stays put (I have it positioned for "slide UP" to use cam).Otherwise, it's perfect for what it does and it's definitely more "secure" and Better-Looking than using a Post-It to cover the lens. Plus, The Price Is Right! :)I ** DO INDEED ** recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: The fit is a little loose, but it does the job

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and it provides piece of mind
reviews.reviewText: Nothing like an analog solution for a piece of digital hardware. It is scary how easy for hackers and kids with some programming knowledge as well as governments and others you wouldn't want to be able to see what you are doing in your own house. I had just bought a Logitech webcam not too long ago and the next model up had this cover on it for a good deal more so I got the one without the cover. Then I saw this cover online for cheap and I got it. It snapped right on and I now have the piece of mind that I have not opened up a digital window for the world to expose me doing innocent or not so innocent things. I simply slide the cover over the lens and voila. If someone has hacked into my system, they may be able to activate the microphone, but they cannot see me or take video or stills of me for nefarious purposes and turn my life upside down.It's an invaluable investment for such a small price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect solution for these Logitech camera
reviews.reviewText: The small inexpensive Logitech cameras are perfectly adequate webcams for most people -- decent video and sound. The only thing missing is a cover. This one works great! It snaps into place easily, and I've found the little slider easy to move. It does not affect sound or video at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfectly on my Logitech C270. Snaps right on securely. As others mention the slide is a little tight but it loosens as time goes on. Huge bonus that you can still see the indicator light while using this cover.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This camera cover works but I only foresee this camera covering working temporarily. It covers the camera however, the fit on the camera itself is very loose . I literally had to tape the top and the bottom just so the cover would fit. Needless to say, I probably would be better off just using a piece of paper like I was doing before because the camera cover really doesn’t serve a purpose at this point because it doesn’t fit unless I use tape and it only covers the camera, even though the camera includes a speaker also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap, but works
reviews.reviewText: This slips over the top of my Logitech webcam easily and fits a little loosely. However this does not impact sound or picture quality at all. I have not had any issues with the slider sticking like some other reviews mentioned. This does the job perfectly, even if it's not the sleekest looking option. Exactly what I needed, and glad this solution exists so I didn't have to buy a more expensive webcam with a built in cover.
